tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE email_campaign_results (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    strategy_id INT,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    segment_id INT,
    segment_name VARCHAR(255),
    conversion_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
    revenue_generated DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, start_date DATE NOT NULL, end_date DATE NOT NULL, strategy VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE test_group (group_id INT PRIMARY KEY, group_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, campaign_id INT NOT NULL, group_size INT NOT NULL, start_date DATE NOT NULL, end_date DATE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE test_results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, group_id INT NOT NULL, metric_1 DECIMAL NOT NULL, metric_2 DECIMAL NOT NULL, metric_3 DECIMAL NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE EmailCampaigns (
 campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 strategy VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ABTestResults (
 result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_id INT,
 variation_name VARCHAR(50),
 clicks INT,
 conversions INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES EmailCampaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TestGroupUsers (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 group_id INT,
 email_address VARCHAR(255),
 conversion_status VARCHAR(10),
 FOREIGN KEY (group_id) REFERENCES ABTestResults(result_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TestGroupSettings (
 group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 test_percentage FLOAT,
 start_time TIME,
 end_time TIME,
 test_completed BOOLEAN,
 FOREIGN KEY (group_id) REFERENCES ABTestResults(result_id)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    conversion_rate FLOAT NOT NULL,
    conversion_status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    total_clicks INT NOT NULL,
    total_conversions INT NOT NULL,
    click_through_rate FLOAT NOT NULL
);
